ingredients.ingredient: salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste

cookingTips: Pat chicken dry before seasoning to maximize skin crispiness
Bake skin-side up at 425°F for 35-40 minutes
Internal temperature should reach 165°F at thickest part
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Emphasize the importance of letting the chicken rest before serving to keep meat juicy and help achieve crispy skin.
